description.value:
Frequency once per day

You've perfected your ability to keep up with all the skills you've learned over your long life, so you're almost never truly untrained at a skill. You reflect on your life experiences, changing the skill you selected with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Ancestral Longevity] (and the skill you selected with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Expert Longevity] if you have that feat).
